power.title: Cloud of Flies
power.fluff: You breathe out a cloud of acidic black flies that streak across the battlefield, swarming your foe and attempting to enter its body

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude
If the target is bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack rolls

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage for the first attack made against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Delban's Deadly Attention
power.fluff: A bolt of frigid starlight shines down and bathes your foe, causing the creature to suffer a spasm of agony just as it attacks you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy in hits you with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes necrotic damage equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target is cursed by you, you can add your curse damage.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: You add your Intelligence modifier to the necrotic damage.
The target chooses either to deal half damage with the triggering attack, or to increase the necrotic damage by 1d8.

power.title: Eldritch Claws
power.fluff: At your command, clawed hands crafted from eldritch energies wrap around your foe

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the Eldritch Pact class feature.

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the primary target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
The attack's damage type and keyword changes depending on your Eldritch Pact:

section.name: Dark Pact, Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: Necrotic damage, and the Necrotic keyword.

section.name: Elemental Pact, Fey Pact, Vestige Pact:
section.text: Psychic damage, and the Psychic keyword.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Fire damage, and the Fire keyword.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Radiant damage, and the Radiant keyword.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your current turn, you can use the Eldritch Rake attack. If this attack was a critical hit, you can use it until the end of your next turn instead.
If this attack was a hit, you use the primary target as the origin square. If it was a miss, you use the space the target occupied when you made the attack.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature other than the primary target
You cannot target the same creature more than once per turn

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You deal damage depending on your Eldritch Pact.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Necrotic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Necrotic keyword.

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: Damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus of the type and keyword matching your elemental affinity.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Psychic keyword.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Fire keyword.

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: Necrotic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Necrotic keyword.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Radiant damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Radiant keyword.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Psychic keyword.

power.title: Eldritch Rain
power.fluff: You fire purple rays of eldritch power at your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature, or two creatures no more than 5 squares apart from each other

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: You can choose to target three creatures no more than 5 squares apart from each other

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: You can choose to make this attack deal the type of damage matching your current elemental affinity and to gain the matching keyword.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: If you target only one creature, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus damage if you only targeted one creature.

power.title: Fiery Bolt
power.fluff: You call up a bolt of golden flame and hurl it at your foe, with anyone standing close to him ending up burned as well

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and each creature adjacent to the target takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Adjacent creatures take additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
